meanings.sent1: Her activistic efforts in the community made a positive impact.
meanings.sent2: The activistic group organized a protest to advocate for change.
meanings.sent3: The activistic squirrel rallied its friends to clean up the park.
meanings.sent4: His activistic spirit burned brightly, igniting others to join the cause.
meanings.sent5: The activistic approach of the team was contagious, inspiring others to take action.

meanings.definition: Showing a strong interest in social or political change.
meanings.sent1: The activistic students campaigned for environmental awareness.
meanings.sent2: She had an activistic mindset, always seeking ways to make a difference.
meanings.sent3: The activistic penguin organized a march for fish equality.
meanings.sent4: His activistic nature was like a beacon, guiding others towards progress.
meanings.sent5: The activistic energy in the room was palpable, driving the conversation towards reform.
